articles.description: England are on course for victory in the first Test against New Zealand after Chris Woakes' crucial two wickets in two balls on the third day in Christchurch.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Tourists on verge of victory in first Test

articles.description: Russell Martin was unhappy with Southampton's disallowed goal against Brighton - but what do the laws say and did VAR get it wrong?
articles.title: Brighton 1-1 Southampton: VAR 'a big problem' says Saints boss Russell Martin

articles.description: Defending champions the Kansas City Chiefs become the first team to claim an NFL play-off spot after beating the Las Vegas Raiders 19-17 at Arrowhead Stadium.
articles.title: NFL: Kansas City Chiefs reach play-offs after beating Las Vegas Raiders

articles.description: Manchester United's new manager Ruben Amorim sits down with BBC Sport's Mark Chapman to discuss his new job and coaching philosophy.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: New Man Utd boss on university, connection with fans and being 'right guy' for job

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has said he is "definitely not fast any more" after another disappointing qualifying performance in his final season at Mercedes.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says he is 'definitely not fast any more' after latest qualifying disappointment

articles.description: Atletico Mineiro face Botafogo in Copa Libertadores final at the River Plate stadium in Argentina.
articles.title: Copa Libertadores final preview: Atletico Mineiro v Botafogo

articles.description: Real Madrid have informed Liverpool of their interest in Trent Alexander-Arnold, Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim is happy with his squad and has not requested any January signings, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Alexander-Arnold, Delap, Cunha, Geertruida, Schmid

articles.description: Dakota Ditcheva superbly stops Taila Santos in the second round to win the PFL flyweight title and become the first British woman to win an MMA world title.
articles.title: MMA: Dakota Ditcheva stops Taila Santos to become first British woman to win MMA world title

articles.description: Those who know Ruud van Nistelrooy say the former striker is "driven", "strong-willed" and "full of self-belief".
articles.title: Ruud van Nistelrooy: What to expect from Leicester's new manager

articles.description: Scotland will need a bigger contribution from their star players in Tuesday's Euro 2025 play-off second leg in Finland, writes Amy Canavan.
articles.title: What more can big names do as Scotland chase Euro 2025?
